Articles.Content:
Hello! I have had Kerbal Space Program for a while and I always play it. I finally decided to buy it last week and am loving v.14. It\'s good they finally added multiple ships and one time

I hope I will become very experienced with this game soon, because I suck at it even though i\'ve had it for like two months.

So thats all I have to say and I hope the creators keep up the good work and produce a awesome game.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome and Happy landing

btw, skunky is that a copy paste thing there or do you type that out everytime?
Enjoy your time on the forums
